OOC: I also said he miscalculated so he could have zoomed through the 
atmosphere and landed on an ameba aboard the Sacriledge Pague which I 
believe is near Earth.  The point I was getting at was he's in this 
demension again.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "hugar_twriker" <hugar_twriker@y...> wrote:
> OOC:  Umm Dewboy, you mentioned that he was on Earth.  Hers the 
email 
> that said so. Suddenly he zooms back to Earth. But he miscalculated 
> his new form 
> and finds himself in control of an Ameba.
> 
> Cutie(thoughts): Dang what the pit am I going to do with this. Well 
> I guess there's only one thing to do. Build advancements.
> 
> He starts absorbing biological matter and any metal he can find in 
an

>

although
